channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34578|2024-08-04T00:19:47.008Z -- wago -- plc
item.description: This vulnerability allows an attacker who has access to the WBM to read and write settings-parameters of the device by sending specifically constructed requests without authentication on multiple WAGO PLCs in firmware versions up to FW07.

item.title: CVE-2021-34566|2024-08-04T00:12:50.402Z -- wago -- 750-81xx%2Fxxx-xxxfw
item.description: In WAGO I/O-Check Service in multiple products an unauthenticated remote attacker can send a specially crafted packet containing OS commands to crash the iocheck process and write memory resulting in loss of integrity and DoS.

item.title: CVE-2021-34569|2024-08-04T00:12:50.524Z -- wago -- 750-81xx%2Fxxx-xxxfw
item.description: In WAGO I/O-Check Service in multiple products an attacker can send a specially crafted packet containing OS commands to crash the diagnostic tool and write memory.

item.title: CVE-2021-34568|2024-08-04T00:12:50.423Z -- wago -- 750-81xx%2Fxxx-xxxfw
item.description: In WAGO I/O-Check Service in multiple products an unauthenticated remote attacker can send a specially crafted packet containing OS commands to provoke a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-34567|2024-08-04T00:12:50.416Z -- wago -- 750-81xx%2Fxxx-xxxfw
item.description: In WAGO I/O-Check Service in multiple products an unauthenticated remote attacker can send a specially crafted packet containing OS commands to provoke a denial of service and an limited out-of-bounds read.

item.title: CVE-2021-34581|2024-08-04T00:19:46.962Z -- wago -- 750-831%2Fxxx-xxx%2C%20750-880%2Fxxx-xxx%2C%20750-881%2C%20750-889
item.description: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime vulnerability in OpenSSL implementation of WAGO 750-831/xxx-xxx, 750-880/xxx-xxx, 750-881, 750-889 in versions FW4 up to FW15 allows an unauthenticated attacker to cause DoS on the device.
